sentences.english: The next day the hunter lured the quails with his quail call as usual.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，獵人照常利用叫聲來引誘鵪鶉。

sentences.english: It was dusk when the hunter drove into the barn and unhitched his horse.
sentences.chinese: 當獵人駕駛入穀倉並且放鬆了他的馬，它是黃昏。

sentences.english: Others are predators. Deviously setting traps to get what they want.
sentences.chinese: 還有些是獵人，迂迴設陷得到她們想要的。

sentences.english: The respec cost for hunter pets is being removed.
sentences.chinese: 獵人寵物的洗點免費了。

sentences.english: The hunter wnosked slowly in the forest! followed by his wolf-dog.
sentences.chinese: 獵人在森林裏逐漸地走着，後背跟着一隻狼狗。

sentences.english: The magnificent Orion Nebula, or M42, is a fuzzy patch in Orion's Sword.
sentences.chinese: 美麗的獵戶座星雲和M42就是獵人手中的那把刀。

sentences.english: Uncle and aunt launched a laundry with the blunt hunter.
sentences.chinese: 伯伯和伯母與直率的獵人創辦了一家洗衣店。

sentences.english: He has the heart of a mighty hunter.
sentences.chinese: 他有一顆強大的獵人之心。

sentences.english: A wolf leaped out of the bushes and took the hunter by surprise.
sentences.chinese: 一隻狼從樹叢中跳了出來，把獵人嚇了一跳。

sentences.english: It happened shortly after this that the Lion was caught by some hunters, who bound him by strong ropes to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 後來獅子被幾個獵人捉住，用粗繩捆綁倒在地上。

sentences.english: After he pulled the trigger, the rifle kicked back and the hunter lost his balance.
sentences.chinese: 獵人扣動板機，獵槍的反衝力使他的身體失去了平衡。

sentences.english: But, when the hunter falls in love with prey, his inexorable doom often starts accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 但是，當獵人愛上獵物的時候，他的劫數常因此肇始。

sentences.english: The two hunters wheel around and ride into the woods along a game trail.
sentences.chinese: 着兩個獵人騎着馬繞了幾圈然後相互追逐着奔進叢林。

sentences.english: Dengar became an independent bounty hunter.
sentences.chinese: 登加成了一名獨立賞金獵人。

sentences.english: The huntsman entered the forest, gun in hand.
sentences.chinese: 那位獵人手裏提着槍走進了樹林。

sentences.english: Not long after this, the lion was caught in a hunter's net.
sentences.chinese: 在這之後不久，獅子被獵人的網套住了。

definition: horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
